00027 #ifndef U_ARRAY_NSLOTS_DFL
00028 #define U_ARRAY_NSLOTS_DFL 512
00029 #endif
00030 
00033 #ifndef U_ARRAY_RESIZE_PAD
00034 #define U_ARRAY_RESIZE_PAD 100
00035 #endif
00036 
00040 typedef enum {
00041         U_ARRAY_TYPE_UNSET = 0,             
00042 #ifdef HAVE_BOOL
00043         U_ARRAY_TYPE_BOOL,                  
00044 #endif  /* HAVE_BOOL */
00045         U_ARRAY_TYPE_CHAR,                  
00046         U_ARRAY_TYPE_U_CHAR,                
00047         U_ARRAY_TYPE_SHORT,                 
00048         U_ARRAY_TYPE_U_SHORT,               
00049         U_ARRAY_TYPE_INT,                   
00050         U_ARRAY_TYPE_U_INT,                 
00051         U_ARRAY_TYPE_LONG,                  
00052         U_ARRAY_TYPE_U_LONG,                
00053 #ifdef HAVE_LONG_LONG
00054         U_ARRAY_TYPE_LONG_LONG,             
00055         U_ARRAY_TYPE_U_LONG_LONG,           
00056 #endif  /* HAVE_LONG_LONG */
00057         U_ARRAY_TYPE_FLOAT,                 
00058         U_ARRAY_TYPE_DOUBLE,                
00059 #ifdef HAVE_LONG_DOUBLE
00060         U_ARRAY_TYPE_LONG_DOUBLE,           
00061 #endif  /* HAVE_LONG_DOUBLE */
00062 #ifdef HAVE_FLOAT_COMPLEX
00063         U_ARRAY_TYPE_FLOAT_COMPLEX,         
00064 #endif  /* HAVE_FLOAT_COMPLEX */
00065 #ifdef HAVE_DOUBLE_COMPLEX
00066         U_ARRAY_TYPE_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,        
00067 #endif  /* HAVE_DOUBLE_COMPLEX */
00068 #ifdef HAVE_LONG_DOUBLE_COMPLEX
00069         U_ARRAY_TYPE_LONG_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,   
00070 #endif  /* HAVE_LONG_DOUBLE_COMPLEX */
00071         U_ARRAY_TYPE_PTR,                   
00072         U_ARRAY_TYPE_MAX = U_ARRAY_TYPE_PTR
00073 } u_array_type_t;
00074          
00075 #define U_ARRAY_TYPE_IS_VALID(t) \
00076     (t > U_ARRAY_TYPE_UNSET && t <= U_ARRAY_TYPE_MAX)
00077 
00078 struct u_array_s;
00079 typedef struct u_array_s u_array_t;
00080 
00081 /* [cd]tor */
00082 int u_array_create (u_array_type_t t, size_t nslots, u_array_t **pda);
00083 void u_array_free (u_array_t *da);
00084 
00085 /* dyn resize */
00086 int u_array_resize (u_array_t *da, size_t req_idx);

00103 int u_array_set_char (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, char v, char *pold);
00104 int u_array_set_u_char (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, unsigned char v, 
00105         unsigned char *pold);
00106 int u_array_set_short (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, short v, short *pold);
00107 int u_array_set_u_short (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, unsigned short v, 
00108         unsigned short *pold);
00109 int u_array_set_int (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, int v, int *pold);
00110 int u_array_set_u_int (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, unsigned int v, 
00111         unsigned int *pold);
00112 int u_array_set_long (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, long v, long *pold);
00113 int u_array_set_u_long (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, unsigned long v, 
00114         unsigned long *pold);
00115 int u_array_set_float (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, float v, float *pold);
00116 int u_array_set_double (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, double v, double *pold);
00117 int u_array_set_ptr (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, void *v, void **pold);

00131 int u_array_get_u_short (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, unsigned short *pv);
00132 int u_array_get_int (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, int *pv);

00136 int u_array_get_float (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, float *pv);
00137 int u_array_get_double (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, double *pv);
00138 int u_array_get_ptr (u_array_t *da, size_t idx, void **pv);
